reviews.review_msg: She's nice. But niceness has nothing to with teaching ability. Her class makes no sense at all.. Sorry, the rating I gave is inaccurate, the minimum I could put is a 1. I would've given a 0 because there's no difference in taking her class or not. Didn't learn a single thing. Avoid at all costs.

Dr.Perry is an  amazing professor he is very helpful and willing to talk to students if they have a problem. He also seems to be very interested in the material which made the class more interesting. I highly recommend him as a teacher, although his classes are not easy.
Super easy course. Homework was all straightforward and quizzes were pretty easy. A few stupid questions on quizzes, but they were easily manageable.

PROS: easy participation marks; flexible with attendance; super caring; likes helping; wants you to succeed. CONS: group projects were 50% of the grade; her standards may be higher than they seem. TIPS: For research papers, make sure you think like a researcher, question every method and argument, provide solid reasoning, be comprehensive.
ESL friendly! Her grading scale is tougher than other professor but she is not a tough marker at all. She is very approachable and helpful in class and during her office hour.
